reviews: Bought primarily as a bacon cooker.  It only has room for 4 pieces of bacon.  Also, the bacon cooks in it’s own grease.  The instructions said that it was dishwasher safe, but when I got it out of the dishwasher, the lid didn’t fit any more.
not as functional as i hoped;  lid doesn't fit well so it's fumbily to get out of microwave;
